### Welcome to my page!


I am a PhD student at the Economics department ([BSE]((https://www.bse.u-bordeaux.fr/))) of the University of Bordeaux in France and affiliated with the [French Institute of Pondicherry](https://www.ifpindia.org/) (IFP) in India.
I am also involved in the [Observatory of Rural Dynamics and Inequalities in South India](https://odriis.hypotheses.org) (ODRIIS), and I am a member of the [AFEDEV](https://afedev.fr/).

Data I am working on (from collection to analysis) are now freely available on [Harvard Dataverse](https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataverse/odriis).

My main field of interest is development economics, and I work on topics related to household indebtedness, labour, and cognition in rural India.
